domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
Excited to announce my VoteSafe Act is being introduced in the House by @ClyburnSC06 and @mlfudge. It: 
→Expands vote-by-mail
→Ensures in-person voting is safe
→Requires 20+ days of early voting

People shouldn’t have to choose between their health and their right to vote.
